title: Coming Together to Respond to the Pandemic
itunes:title: Coming Together to Respond to the Pandemic
description:
Jamie Metzl, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council, discusses the need for global leadership to combat the coronavirus pandemic and his Pledge of Global Interdependence. He says the "One Shared World" movement demands that our political leaders work to meet our global common needs.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
